question.title: Why is there increase in APK size after upgrading to Android 15, AGP 8.8.1 and Kotlin 2.0 and why is the androidx.compose.* not being obfuscated?
question.body:
[ I am migrating my project to support Android 15, updating both the target SDK and compile SDK to 35. After upgrading to AGP 8.8.1 and Kotlin 2.0, we noticed an increase of ~2.4 MB in the release APK size.

Upon inspection, it appears that a specific folder androidx.compose.** is no longer being obfuscated by R8/ProGuard. This results in larger class/method names and potentially unused code being retained.]

    release {
    minifyEnabled true
    debuggable false
    shrinkResources true
    proguardFiles proguard-rules.pro
}


    proguard-rules.pro is empty

In older apk with AGP < 7 , Kotlin 1.9.0, target SDK 34 it is working as expected.

Let me know if you need more details ?
